// adijimmy
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
ll primes[100005];
void pre(){
 for(int i=1;i<=100001;i++) primes[i] = 1;
 for(int i=2;i<=100001;i++){
   if(primes[i]==1){
    for(int j=1;j*i<=100001;j++) primes[i*j] = primes[i*j]*i;
   }
 }
}
vector<pair<int,int> > v;
int main(){
  int t,n,k,i;
  pre();
  for(i=1;i<=100000;i++) v.push_back(make_pair(primes[i],i));
  sort(v.begin(),v.end());
  scanf("%d",&t);
  int cnt;
  while(t--){
     cnt = 0;
     scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
     for(i=0;i<=100000;i++){
       if(v[i].second<=n) cnt++;
       if(cnt==k) break;
     }
     printf("%d\n",v[i].second);
 }
 return 0;
}
